name: Hello Penguin 2 HD
storyline: Clark, Pumpkin Knight, Future Robot, and Cage Fuck go on an adventure to defeat the overlord Penguin. Through many trials and hardships, they find themselves at the foot of his domain, the Steps of Eternity. With one final push, the heroes need to gather all their strength to retake their destiny, and save the world.
summary:
Reality and unreality collide. The fine line between what is and what is not begins to tear. Your heart is beating out of your chest.

Yo, It's Penguin. Yo, It's Penguin. Hello Penguin 2 HD is the all new HDquel to Hello Penguin 2 (SD).

Attempt to stop it, we dare you!
